reviewText:
The worst movie out of the 3 movies. Do not waste your time to watch this movie.
The wailer 2 is the best movie to watch.

I usually don't write reviews..Iam writing this review, because Im a fan of la llorona movies..I believe this is the worst movie out of the 3 movies of La llorona. Do not waste your time watching this movie. I believe La llorona 2 is the best movie to watch..I hope this review is helpful to you..
Purchased used copy and the film was not playable as it froze two thirds of the way through the film. Purchase new unless you are purchasing through a guaranteeing agency like FYE.

The movie was pretty good, I own all three La Llorona films, it was kinda freaky as I and my family tried to watch all three on the same night and we could not as the films two and three would not play all the way through until we watched them on separate nights it scared my daughter and grand kids because we attempted this on more than one occasion i thought it was pretty weird. We enjoyed the firm.
